about_the_game:
This digital artbook is over 100 pages and jam-packed with character info, concept artwork, and more from Silent Hope.

The artbook is available in English.

How to access the artbook:
1. Install Silent Hope
2. Right-click Silent Hope in your Steam Library and go to “Properties”
3. In the Properties window, go to “DLC” and confirm that “Silent Hope - Artbook” is installed
4. In the Properties window, go to “Installed Files” and click “Browse...”
5. A file explorer will open with the “SilentHope_Digital_Artbook.pdf” file in it!
